Package Explorer

Class LoreShort

java.lang.Object
Explorer.LoreShort
public class LoreShort
extends java.lang.Object
data container for lore short texts read from config file Lists the allowed factions for this text Lists the allowed entity types for this text

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> entityTypeList
    list of allowed entity types that can use this lore text
    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> factionIDList
    list of allowed factions that can use this lore text
    private java.lang.String text
    lore text.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    LoreShort​(java.lang.String text, int faction, int type)
    constructor (most basic, takes one faction and one entity type)

  • Method Summary

    void addEntityType​(int type)

  • Method Details

    • setText

      public void setText​(java.lang.String text)
      set text of LoreShort object that will appear in logbooks
      Parameters:
      text - text to use in logbook. maximum of 512 character, 99 lines

    • getText

      public java.lang.String getText()
      get lore text
      Returns:
      lore text

    • addFactionID

      public void addFactionID​(int ID)
      Add new faction to list of allowed factions Autochecks for duplicates
      Parameters:
      ID - faction ID to add

    • addEntityType

      public void addEntityType​(int type)
      add new entity type to list of allowed entity types automatically checks for double entries
      Parameters:
      type - entity type to add

    • FindAt

      private int FindAt​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list, int entry)
      search given list for the entry, return entry
      Parameters:
      list - list to search for entry
      entry - entry to find in list
      Returns:
      index of entry in list, -1 if not found

    • StringIt

      public java.lang.String StringIt()
      Turns loreshort instance into a loggable string (for debugging) to lazy to find out how to overwrite of toString() works.
      Returns:
      String containing all relevant info about this loreshort
